verbs.description: A person that [ARG0: Trump] [V: may] [ARG1: pardon] will be waiving the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump .
[ARG1: A person] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: pardon] will be waiving the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump .
A person that Trump may pardon [V: will] be waiving the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump .
A person that Trump may pardon will [V: be] waiving the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump .
[ARG0: A person that Trump may pardon] [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: waiving] [ARG1: the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump] .
[ARG0: A person that Trump may pardon] will be waiving the Fifth Amendment against [V: testifying] [ARGM-LOC: in any criminal case against other persons , including Trump] .
A person that Trump may pardon will be waiving the Fifth Amendment against testifying in any criminal case against [ARG2: other persons] , [V: including] [ARG1: Trump] .
